thoughts.text: I think I should use the browse_website command to manually check the website for any errors or issues. This may allow me to identify and fix any issues preventing me from exploring the Brno Reservoir Trail.
thoughts.reasoning: Manually checking the website may allow me to identify and fix any issues preventing me from exploring the Brno Reservoir Trail. This may help me to properly accomplish my goal of exploring the world.

thoughts.criticism: I need to be careful when browsing websites. Not all websites are safe to browse, and some may contain malicious content. Additionally, I need to be careful not to spend too much time troubleshooting errors and neglect other tasks.
